name: Ohm's Law
description:
Ohm's Law is designed to be the very start of a full electrical engineering program taught within VR. In its "current" form, the VR app has a short exercise to practice one of the founding principles of electrical engineering. The app is also multi-player, so groups of students and teacher are welcome to try it out.

This app was built by Lance Powell, CTO of VEDX Solutions, and Michael Barngrover, founder of Raptor Dance Studios. Additional assets and logo are provided by VEDX Intern Gulsum Ferah.

If you represent a school and you'd like to have a full experience to use in the classroom, feel free to contact me personally, or visit us at: vedx.io
